title: Does Wilmington have an enforceable ordinance regarding sight line requirements at road intersections, i.e. the prohibition of any structurre or vegetation that obstructs a motorist\'s view to the right of left while sitting at an intersection awiting the opportunity to enter/cross the intersection? EXAMPLE of dangerous intersection,Colonial/Country Club and Wrightsville Ave., NE corner is totally blind to the east.
